headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Juggernaut
content: Having a one-man engine of destruction on your team sounds like a great idea, right? They might be slow, but they carry more firepower than a SAM battery and theyâ€™re tougher than a nuclear bunker. Not so fast though, because in this Adversary Mode your biggest strength is your biggest weakness: both teams get a juggernaut, and if yours gets taken out, you lose. Tread carefully - if you can.
